content: Ok here is the one rule this time----Get it off your chest, what ticked you off this week. If you don't agree with someone, just post your own gripe supporting your view---without tearing down anyone. In other words, support your opinion in a fashion that you may change someones mind about thiers. This is really gonna be hard for some people to do----right E? Just blow off steam.

content: For me, it was seeing that the Leader of our Nation bowed so deeply before a king of another State. He did not do this for any other people he has met. He screwed up several other protocols yet we are told that this mistake was "proper" protocol? Huh? Are we really so dumb the people saying this think we should just accept it? I am ashamed and so sorry this guy is out President. The Flag bearers at the 1936 Olympics and atop Iwo Jima must be spinning in thier graves.

content: quote: Originally posted by 101MPRAT: I give only one political assesment. All politicians suck. Don't give me any of the Rep. Dem. crap. With that I am right with you. In FLA I am in the Veterans Party. Bad part, no Primary vote. These two Parties of Clowns really have it locked up. I used to think we needed a third party, till I lived in Puerto Rico, 3 makes it even worse, and now there is the start of a 4th. I support the Puerto Ricans for Puerto Rico, in that they want to remove the other 3. (Personally, I think the original 3 are all contolled by one group of the rich that use the parties to keep PR'ians poor and infighting while the rich keep profits high....oh, I think there is a knock at the door, brb......thhhip thhip thiip....garsp gasp gak!) Nothing to see here....move along.
